txt.en: Léofmar will not survive for much longer without an antidote to the poison he ingested when eating the inedible berries.

You gently feed the herbs to Léofmar, but you do not see any positive effect. His condition is unchanged.\n\n'You see? It is the curse. Thank you for your goodness, [placeholder], but you cannot stop my fate.'

'It was good of you to help, [placeholder], but they will be back. A curse does not throw up its hands and abandon its purpose because of a minor setback.\n\n'Death will take me, and I will be a tortured shade, haunted by my crimes. It is hopeless.'
Léofmar will not survive for much longer without an antidote to the poison he ingested when eating the inedible berries.
Plants that have mild anti-poison properties can be found throughout the forest near Léofmar.\n\nYou should pick medicinal plants in the hope that they will cure Léofmar.
Léofmar is where you left him, sick and dying in the centre of Fangorn's eaves.\n\nYou should rush the medicine to Léofmar at once.
